description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the eighth Lunar Year. The eighth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Ram.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the eighth Lunar Year. The eighth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Ram.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o oitavo Ano Lunar. O oitavo Ano Lunar é dedicado à Ovelha.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第八地支未，该年的生肖为羊。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr des Schafs aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Geschicklichkeit und Ausdauer um vier.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the eighth Lunar Year. The eighth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Ram.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the eighth Lunar Year. The eighth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Ram.
description.fr: Une cape magnifiquement confectionnée, ornée d'un symbole qui représente la huitième Année Lunaire. La huitième Année Lunaire est dédiée au Bélier.
description.id: Jubah yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Lunar Year kedelapan. Lunar Year kedelapan ini didedikasikan untuk Kambing.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the eighth Lunar Year. The eighth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Ram.
description.jp: 8番目の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。旧正月は羊に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 8 년을 상징하는 상징으로 장식 된 아름답게 제작 된 망토. 음력 8 년은 램에게 바쳐집니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the eighth Lunar Year. The eighth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Ram.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the eighth Lunar Year. The eighth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Ram.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом восьмого года китайского календаря - овцой.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el octavo Año Lunar. El octavo Año Lunar está dedicado al Carnero.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the eighth Lunar Year. The eighth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Ram.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่แปด ปีจันทรคติที่แปดอุทิศให้กับราม
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖羊年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt được trang trí với biểu tượng tượng trưng cho ngày mồng tám Âm lịch. Mùng tám Âm lịch dành riêng cho tháng Rằm.
